snippet: The slow economic recovery has recently become even slower. But whether it’s a temporary stumble or a signal of possible recession is an open question.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column, citing new data and the work of some economists who are sifting through it, warns that the slowing economy could be a temporary stumble or signal another recession.
lead_paragraph: The slow economic recovery has recently become even slower. But whether it’s a temporary stumble or a signal of possible recession is an open question.

headline.print_headline: This Season, Cold Facts Are Getting In the Way
headline.seo: Bad Economic News Is Chilling Investors’ Summer
headline.main: This Season, Cold Facts Are Getting in Investors’ Way
